summary: The castaways must try to readjust to life in civilization after they are rescued from the island.
cast: Bob Denver|Alan Hale Jr.|Jim Backus|Natalie Schafer|Judith Baldwin|Russell Johnson|Dawn Wells|Vincent Schiavelli|Art LaFleur|Norman Bartold|Barbara Mallory|June Whitley Taylor|Martin Rudy|Mary Gregory|Glenn Robards|Diana Chesney|Victor Rogers|Michael Flanagan|Martin Ashe|Robert Wood|John Wheeler|Alex Rodine|Don Marshall|Mel Prestidge|Lewis Arquette|Judd Laurance|Michael Macready|Richard Rorke|Marcus K. Mukai|Snag Werris|Micki Waugh|Alisa Powell|Portia Stevens|Candace Bowen|Mario Machado|Stan Rodarte
title: Rescue from Gilligan's Island
